word: This monstrous doctrine is essentially the same as the Romish claim that “the pope can dispense above the law, and of wrong make right, by correcting and changing laws;” that “he can pronounce sentences and judgments in contradiction . . . to the law of God and man.” Both reveal the inspiration of the same master-spirit,—of him who, even among the sinless inhabitants of Heaven, began his work of seeking to break down the righteous restraints of the law of God.
